body.content:
\
View a summary of the updates.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              

As a new admin to the Microsoft 365 admin center, you’ll get weekly emails from the message center about upcoming changes to your services until September 19, 2025. Update your preferences to continue getting emails like this one. Go to preferences

Message center announcements

September 8, 2025 - September 14, 2025

PURECONSULTING

Major updates

Microsoft 365 Copilot Apps installation on devices with Microsoft 365 Apps

MC1152323 | September 12 - Starting October 2025, Microsoft will automatically install the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on Windows devices with Microsoft 365 desktop apps, except in the EEA. The app appears in the Start menu, enabled by default, with admins able to opt out and prepare users accordingly.
View more

Microsoft 365 Copilot Apps installation on devices with Microsoft 365 Apps

MC1152323 | September 12 - Starting October 2025, Microsoft will automatically install the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on Windows devices with Microsoft 365 desktop apps, except in the EEA. The app appears in the Start menu, enabled by default, with admins able to opt out and prepare users accordingly.
View more

New filtering capability for SharePoint Embedded containers using sensitivity labels

MC1152318 | September 12 - SharePoint Embedded will introduce a new default filtering feature by sensitivity labels for containers, rolling out worldwide from late October to November 2025. Admins can better organize containers without impacting user workflows. Organizations should review label taxonomies and update documentation accordingly.
View more

New filtering capability for SharePoint Embedded containers using sensitivity labels

MC1152318 | September 12 - SharePoint Embedded will introduce a new default filtering feature by sensitivity labels for containers, rolling out worldwide from late October to November 2025. Admins can better organize containers without impacting user workflows. Organizations should review label taxonomies and update documentation accordingly.
View more

Update: Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Teams: Unified management of Teams apps in Teams, Outlook, and the Microsoft 365 app

MC796790 | September 12 - Microsoft is unifying app and agent availability management across Teams, Outlook, and Microsoft 365 admin centers to eliminate mismatches. The rollout starts late September 2025 in three phases, synchronizing settings and providing a consolidated management experience. No immediate action is required, but reviewing current settings is recommended.
View more

Update: Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Teams: Unified management of Teams apps in Teams, Outlook, and the Microsoft 365 app

No immediate action is required, but reviewing current settings is recommended.
View more

(Updated) Important Update: Teams Meeting Join URL Validation

MC1120871 | September 11 - Microsoft Teams will validate meeting join URLs starting September 30, 2025, to prevent altered or rewritten links from blocking access, affecting users of the old Teams calendar app. The new calendar app redirects safely without blocking. No admin action is needed for Safe Links users; third-party URL rewriting must exclude Teams links.
View more

(Updated) Important Update: Teams Meeting Join URL Validation

(Updated) Remove toggle for Calendar in Teams

MC1129730 | September 11 - Microsoft Teams is removing the toggle for the legacy calendar, making the new Microsoft 365 calendar the default. This update, launching from September to December 2025 across environments, requires no admin action but users should be informed and documentation updated accordingly.
View more

Manager insights now in Viva Insights web app, with new team view for Copilot Dashboard

MC1150123 | September 8 - Microsoft Teams will enable admins to assign custom external access policies by user or group, allowing specific control over which external domains they can interact with. This feature, available from September 2025, supports five policy options and will be manageable via PowerShell initially, then through the Teams admin center UI.
View more

Expanding Microsoft 365 Copilot Search admin experience to AI admin role

Rolling out worldwide mid-September 2025, it’s on by default for eligible licenses. Admin access is controlled via Microsoft Entra ID, enhancing governance and compliance monitoring.

View more

View a summary of the updates.

Message center announcements

September 1, 2025 - September 7, 2025

\
Hervorragend zusammenarbeiten
Willkommen bei der
PureAI Team-Gruppe
Teamseite für PureAI Zusammenarbeit
Private Gruppe mit 0 Mitgliedern
Gruppe in Outlook anzeigen

Erste Schritte

Ihre Einstellungen sehen vor, dass Sie nur Antworten und Ereignisse in Ihren Posteingang erhalten. Ändern Sie diese Einstellung unten oder überall, wo die Gruppe in Outlook angezeigt wird, um alle Unterhaltungen dieser Gruppe anzuzeigen.

Im Posteingang folgen

Bringen Sie die Unterhaltung in Gang
Beginnen Sie Ihre eigene Unterhaltung. Oder holen Sie einfach auf. Alles im Gruppenposteingang.

Halten Sie Ihre Sachen zusammen
Jetzt befinden sich Ihre Dokumente und Anlagen an einem Ort.

Auf derselben Seite bleiben
Gruppen, die gemeinsam Notizen erstellen, bleiben zusammen. Im Gruppennotizbuch.

Verpassen Sie nichts mehr
Tracken Sie Meilensteine (und alles dazwischen) im Gruppenkalender.

Zusammenarbeiten mit Ihrer Gruppe
in Microsoft 365

Nahtloses Erstellen von Inhalten

Die SharePoint-Teamwebsite der Gruppe ist der Ort, um Neuigkeiten zu teilen, gemeinsam an Inhalten zu arbeiten und diese zu organisieren, umfangreiche Daten in Listen zu verwalten und alle Websiteaktivitäten aller Mitglieder nachzuverfolgen.

Ausprobieren

Organisieren von Gruppenarbeit mit Planner

Planner macht es Ihrem Team leicht, neue Pläne zu erstellen, Aufgaben zu organisieren und zuzuweisen, Dateien zu teilen, über die Arbeit zu chatten und Updates zum aktuellen Status zu erhalten.

Ausprobieren

Weiter gehen. Mehr erreichen. Hier nachsehen.

Folgen Sie Ihren X-Feeds.

Tracken Sie Ihre Salesforce-Updates.

Alle Ihre Trello-Karten, -Listen und -Boards.

Teambenachrichtigungen von Jira.

Alle Connectors anzeigen

As a new admin to the Microsoft 365 admin center, you’ll get weekly emails from the message center about upcoming changes to your services until September 19, 2025. Update your preferences to continue getting emails like this one. Go to preferences

Message center announcements

August 18, 2025 - August 24, 2025

PURECONSULTING

Major updates

Retirement of web-based “Share to Teams” experience from Outlook

MC1140180 | August 22 - The web-based "Share to Teams" feature in Outlook will retire between September 22 and October 3, 2025. Users without the Teams desktop app will be prompted to install it, while those with the app continue sharing via Teams. No admin action is required, but user notification is recommended.
View more

(Updated) DNS Provisioning Change

MC1048624 | August 22 - Starting October 1, 2025, A records for new Accepted Domains will be provisioned under mx.microsoft to support DNSSEC adoption. Automation relying on mail.protection.outlook.com must update to use the List serviceConfigurationRecords Graph API for MX records. DNS resolution will fallback if DNSSEC is not enabled.
View more
